about_the_game:
SSR Summoners is a turnbased combat online idle fantasy RPG, featuring the Gacha system, allowing players to summon powerful heroes and rare characters to build their ultimate team. Set in a rich, fantasy world, the game combines strategic gameplay with an engaging storyline, offering both offline and online progression. The Gacha system enhances the experience, providing a constant stream of new characters to collect and upgrade. With its blend of immersive combat, captivating quests, and idle mechanics, SSR Summoners delivers a rewarding experience for all types of players.

Summon and Unleash the Power of SSR Heroes

Embark on Epic Quests and Challenges

Build and Dominate with Strategic Formations

Unite in Guild Battles
detailed_description:
SSR Summoners is a turnbased combat online idle fantasy RPG, featuring the Gacha system, allowing players to summon powerful heroes and rare characters to build their ultimate team. Set in a rich, fantasy world, the game combines strategic gameplay with an engaging storyline, offering both offline and online progression. The Gacha system enhances the experience, providing a constant stream of new characters to collect and upgrade. With its blend of immersive combat, captivating quests, and idle mechanics, SSR Summoners delivers a rewarding experience for all types of players.

Summon and Unleash the Power of SSR Heroes

Embark on Epic Quests and Challenges

Build and Dominate with Strategic Formations

name: SSR Summoners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
